A color-blind safe qualitative colorscale (Okabe-Ito)

Source: R/thematic.R
okabe_ito.Rd

This is the default qualitative colorscale in thematic_on()

okabe_ito(n = NULL)

Arguments

n

number of colors.

Value

a vector of color codes.

References

https://jfly.uni-koeln.de/color/

See also

thematic_on()
